subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Virginia Tech quarterback Sean Glennon held an orange in one hand and a most valuable player trophy in the other — not exactly a scene anyone would have envisioned after Glennon was booed to end last season and was benched to start this one.
snippet: Virginia Tech quarterback Sean Glennon held an orange in one hand and a most valuable player trophy in the other — not exactly a scene anyone would have envisioned after Glennon was booed to end last season and was benched to start this one.
